ThingDef.label: stunning turret
ThingDef.description: A portable automatic turret designed to stun an opponent for a short time. Requires steel to refurbish its barrel after heavy use. This turret does not do damage. Does not explode.

ThingDef.label: stunning-turret gun
ThingDef.description: A simple automatic gun made to be mounted on a turret.

ThingDef.label: stunning-turret gun
ThingDef.description: A simple automatic gun made to be mounted on a turret.

ThingDef.label: tazing turret
ThingDef.description: A portable automatic turret designed to taze a target. Requires steel to refurbish its barrel after heavy use. This turret does light damage, and will try to down a target. Does not explode.

ThingDef.label: tazing-turret gun
ThingDef.description: A simple automatic gun made to be mounted on a turret.

ThingDef.label: tazing-turret gun
ThingDef.description: A simple automatic gun made to be mounted on a turret.

ThingDef.label: sniper turret
ThingDef.description: A portable automatic turret designed to take out targets at long distances. Requires steel to refurbish its barrel after heavy use. Might explode out to 4 tiles when damaged.

ThingDef.label: sniper-turret gun
ThingDef.description: A simple automatic gun made to be mounted on a turret.

ThingDef.label: standard turret
ThingDef.description: A portable automatic turret designed to hold its own during a battle. Requires steel to refurbish its barrel after heavy use. Might explode out to 4 tiles when damaged.

ThingDef.label: standard-turret gun
ThingDef.description: A simple automatic gun made to be mounted on a turret.

ThingDef.label: energy turret
ThingDef.description: A portable automatic turret designed to shoot lazers. Does not require ammunition, but takes 800 watts to power. High rate of continuous fire, but low damage that causes burning. Amazing supression and chaos. Might explode out to 6 tiles when damaged.

ThingDef.label: energy-turret gun
ThingDef.description: A simple automatic gun made to be mounted on a turret.

ThingDef.label: energy-turret gun
ThingDef.description: A simple automatic gun made to be mounted on a turret.

ThingDef.label: heavy turret
ThingDef.description: A portable automatic turret designed to hurt heavy targets. Fires continuously. Requires a lot of steel to refurbish its barrel after use. Might explode out to 6 tiles when damaged.

ThingDef.label: heavy-turret gun
ThingDef.description: A simple automatic gun made to be mounted on a turret.

ThingDef.label: shredder turret
ThingDef.description: A portable automatic turret designed to take on targets with low or no armor. Requires steel to refurbish its barrel after heavy use. Might explode out to 2 tiles when damaged.

ThingDef.label: shredder-turret gun
ThingDef.description: A simple automatic gun made to be mounted on a turret.

ThingDef.label: concussive turret
ThingDef.description: A portable automatic turret designed to shoot explosive bullets. Requires steel to refurbish its barrel after heavy use. Might explode out to 6 tiles when damaged.

ThingDef.label: concussive-turret gun
ThingDef.description: A simple automatic gun made to be mounted on a turret.

ThingDef.label: EMP turret
ThingDef.description: A portable automatic turret designed to take on mechanoids. Not effective against fleshy targets. Might explode out to 6 tiles when damaged.

ThingDef.label: EMP-turret gun
ThingDef.description: A simple automatic gun made to be mounted on a turret.
